00048 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 |   PLT_FileMediaServerDelegate
00050 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00056 class PLT_FileMediaServerDelegate : public PLT_MediaServerDelegate
00057 {
00058 public:
00059     // class methods
00060     static NPT_String BuildSafeResourceUri(const NPT_HttpUrl& base_uri, 
00061                                            const char*        host, 
00062                                            const char*        file_path);
00063     // constructor & destructor
00064     PLT_FileMediaServerDelegate(const char* url_root, const char* file_root);
00065     virtual ~PLT_FileMediaServerDelegate();
00066     
00067 protected:
00068     // PLT_MediaServerDelegate methods
00069     virtual NPT_Result OnBrowseMetadata(PLT_ActionReference&          action, 
00070                                         const char*                   object_id, 
00071                                         const char*                   filter,
00072                                         NPT_UInt32                    starting_index,
00073                                         NPT_UInt32                    requested_count,
00074                                         const NPT_List<NPT_String>&   sort_criteria,
00075                                         const PLT_HttpRequestContext& context);
00076     virtual NPT_Result OnBrowseDirectChildren(PLT_ActionReference&          action, 
00077                                               const char*                   object_id, 
00078                                               const char*                   filter,
00079                                               NPT_UInt32                    starting_index,
00080                                               NPT_UInt32                    requested_count,
00081                                               const NPT_List<NPT_String>&   sort_criteria,
00082                                               const PLT_HttpRequestContext& context);
00083     virtual NPT_Result OnSearchContainer(PLT_ActionReference&          action, 
00084                                          const char*                   object_id, 
00085                                          const char*                   search_criteria,
00086                                          const char*                   filter,
00087                                          NPT_UInt32                    starting_index,
00088                                          NPT_UInt32                    requested_count,
00089                                          const NPT_List<NPT_String>&   sort_criteria, 
00090                                          const PLT_HttpRequestContext& context);
00091     virtual NPT_Result ProcessFileRequest(NPT_HttpRequest&              request, 
00092                                           const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context,
00093                                           NPT_HttpResponse&             response);
00094     
00095     // overridable methods
00096     virtual NPT_Result ExtractResourcePath(const NPT_HttpUrl& url, NPT_String& file_path);
00097     virtual NPT_String BuildResourceUri(const NPT_HttpUrl& base_uri, const char* host, const char* file_path);
00098     virtual NPT_Result ServeFile(const NPT_HttpRequest&        request, 
00099                                  const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context,
00100                                  NPT_HttpResponse&             response,
00101                                  const NPT_String&             file_path);
00102     virtual NPT_Result GetFilePath(const char* object_id, NPT_String& filepath);
00103     virtual bool       ProcessFile(const NPT_String&, const char* filter = NULL) { NPT_COMPILER_UNUSED(filter); return true;}
00104     virtual PLT_MediaObject* BuildFromFilePath(const NPT_String&             filepath, 
00105                                                const PLT_HttpRequestContext& context,
00106                                                bool                          with_count = true,
00107                                                bool                          keep_extension_in_title = false);
00108     
00109 protected:
00110     friend class PLT_MediaItem;
00111     
00112     NPT_String  m_UrlRoot;
00113     NPT_String  m_FileRoot;
00114     bool        m_FilterUnknownOut;
00115     
00116     PLT_MediaCache<NPT_Reference<NPT_List<NPT_String> >, NPT_TimeStamp> m_DirCache;
00117 };

00119 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00120 |   PLT_FileMediaServer
00121 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00127 class PLT_FileMediaServer : public PLT_MediaServer,
00128                             public PLT_FileMediaServerDelegate
00129 {
00130 public:    // constructor
00131     PLT_FileMediaServer(const char*  file_root,
00132                         const char*  friendly_name,
00133                         bool         show_ip = false,
00134                         const char*  uuid = NULL,
00135                         NPT_UInt16   port = 0,
00136                         bool         port_rebind = false) :
00137         PLT_MediaServer(friendly_name, 
00138                         show_ip,
00139                         uuid, 
00140                         port,
00141                         port_rebind),
00142         PLT_FileMediaServerDelegate("/", file_root) {SetDelegate(this);}
00143 
00144 protected:
00145     virtual ~PLT_FileMediaServer() {}
00146 };
